Yoga + Fitness Membership

My membership gives you the chance to take classes with me anytime anywhere with the option to cancel at any point, no bad vibes. All of my yoga and fitness classes are in one place and the chance to connect with other like minded people. With the Unlimited membership you get the choice of how you work out and how you stretch! From 16 workout classes and 16 yoga classes a month you get to choose what works best within your weekly schedule.

Unlimited Package

£25 per month (inc tax)

  • All classes - 4 new Yoga classes + 4 new TotalBody classes each week
  • All recordings are available for the whole time you are a Patreon Member so you get a whole archive of 40+ classes to choose from
  • Unlimited booking for all LIVE classes
  • Pose and exercise break down and discussion
  • Short stretch and strength videos
  • Join Now

Beginners Package

£15 per month (inc Tax)

  • 1 new 30min Yoga class each week
  • 1 new TotalBody class each week
  • All recordings are available for the whole time you are a Patreon Member so you get a whole archive of classes to choose from
  • Pose and exercise break down and discussion
  • Join Now
